import React, { Component } from 'react' import LayoutDashboard from '../../components/LayoutDashboard' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' class CreatePost extends Component { state = { name: '', } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ name: event.target.value }); } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const user = { name: this.state.name }; axios.post(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users`, { user }) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) } render () { return ( {/* Main Content */}
